name: Hedgehog Life
description:
Controls:
WASD = Movement
Space = Place leaf in base

Context:
You are a Hedgehog! you need to fatten up by finding slugs, then make a home for winter. 

Background:
It is the first day of half term and I wanted to make a quick game which would allow me to learn some new programming skills. 
The idea for the game was courtesy  of my mum who loves Hedgehogs.
I am pretty pleased with how this turned out. It feels like more of an "Experience" than a game seeing as there is no way to fail. Originally there was going to be a badger which you had to avoid, however, the more I worked on the game, the more I enjoyed the relaxing mood of just searching out slugs and leaves. 

I hope you enjoy playing this as much as I enjoyed making it!
